mapper.insert: insert into t_billfrom_info( `date`, playontime, showname, channelId, lunboId) value(#{date},#{playontime},#{showname},#{channelId},#{lunboId})
mapper.select: select playontime, showname from t_billfrom_info where `date` = #{date} and channelId = #{channelId}
select playontime as showTime, showname as channelName from t_billfrom_info where `date` = #{date} and channelId = #{channelId}

select t1.playontime, t1.showname, t1.date, t2.isFengmi, t2.fengmiId, t2.orderIndex from t_billfrom_info t1 left join (select '1' as isFengmi, lunboId, fengmiId, orderIndex from t_fengmi_lunbo where is_delete != 1 ) t2 on t1.lunboId=t2.lunboId where channelId = #{channelId}
